channel.title: Org on Isaac Zhou
channel.description: Recent content in Org on Isaac Zhou

item.title: Writing Hugo blog in Org
item.description: First Heading with the post This post will be exported as content/posts/hugo-blog-in-org.md Its title will be “Hugo Blog in Org” It will have hugo and org tags and emacs as category The menu item weight and post weight are auto-calculated The menu item identifier is auto-set the lastmod property in the front-matter is set automatically to the time of expoert A sub-heading under that heading It’s draft state will be marked as true as the subtree has the todo state set to TODO
